response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and value, I would like to propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $7,200. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a discounted price. I trust it will meet and exceed your expectations. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 7200}
